phrases: Hey, the float's coming along pretty nicely.
Ah, umm... has Yano been showing up?
I was a little worried he might be slacking off or something.
After all, that is all he did last year.
After what happened, he completely stopped coming to see me...
I see... he is been showing up...
Thank goodness... he is the same as always...
Even though I broke up with him, why is it that I still do not want to hurt him?
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
You did not come in a yukata this year.
Well, it is just us girls tonight.
But Nana, did not a certain someone invite you to come?
N-No... actually, I was wondering how to decline the invitation if he had asked me...
There is no way he would, Mizu-chin.
Do not make me repeat myself.
I had decided to decline anyway...
Since it is just us girls, let us make something of this!
Would you please do a round of goldfish scooping for me?
I heard you were really good at it...
It would be cheaper to just buy one at a goldfish store.
I am so much better with the wafer plates than these pois...
Even if it is cheaper at a goldfish store, it would not mean anything!
It is a big pop-eyed goldfish!
I am going to treat it well for the rest of my life!
We should be having a blast, too!
Let us beat them with some turtle scooping!
He is here with other people...
Hey, twilight in the summer really makes you want to see the one you love, do not you think?
Or on rainy days, or during the season when cherry blossoms fall, or in those long nights...
That is all year round for you...
It is harder than it looks, huh?
Oh... he is pretty good at this.
Hey, what do you want to do next?
Since you are such a cutie.
Go on and take it, miss.
She is my girlfriend, so would you please not do that?
He was working with the guy in the stall.
He would give you the turtle for free, then try to sell you expensive food for it.
It is hard to decline something you are getting for free, right?
Why is Takeuchi-kun looking at me so gently?
You sure know a lot about this stuff.
Ah... a friend of mine was asked to do it part-time a long time ago.
Ah, and I am sorry about calling you my girlfriend!
It is just such a pain once you get mixed up with them.
Y-You got separated from your friends because of me...
I just got a text message from them.
Make things go well with Takeuchi. ('')
Well, I will be going then.
I made plans with people from around my area again, like last year.
If you ever think you are getting into a dangerous situation, call me right away.
I will be there in a flash.
This is the same girl who said it was not possible because Takeuchi-kun was Yano's best friend.
If Takeuchi-kun found out he was being refused for that reason, he would not be able to do anything either, I am sure.
Of course, this is just considering the off-chance that he does actually like you.
I thought you would have invited her.
Well, she did say it is not possible.
She said you bothered her, did not she?
I wonder if she is here in her yukata again...
She might have come in a yukata...
Knowing her, she might have come alone with her girlfriends, and been an east mark for some stall keeper.
I would not worry about that.
They do not make marks of really cute girls.
You are really... a nice guy.
I do not say things like no matter what happens, we will always be friends.
What is that suppose to be?
If only I were a good guy like you.
Hey... before, you told Takahashi you would be waiting for her, but...
When you still have not organized anything there is no way it will go well.
Right now, it is impossible for you.
You are in love with Nana-san, are not you?
She is still alive within you.
Which is why you have no right to go out with Takahashi.
I am going to make my move.
About this... no matter how many times I calculate it, there is hardly any profit.
Yano, it does not matter if we make a profit, as long as we break even.
After all, this is for the school festival.
Anyway, we will scare away customers if the prices are too high, right?
We are all going to work for nothing?
We are going to get nothing out of all the blood and sweat we have put into it?
Let us at least make enough to take care of the fees for putting this up.
It is too stupid and pointless like this.
I could not agree with you more.
Let us leave the drink menu alone, and raise the prices on the side order menu slightly.
But in exchange, let us add some sort of special deal.
If we manage to sell a lot, we will be able to eat and drink for free afterwards.
This should definitely make everyone a little more excited about selling.
How is one able... to forget about the dead?
I just came to grab some duct tape.
Those two are getting along unusually well this year.
Last year, you could feel the cold vibes coming off them.
I wonder what happened this year...
Please come to Class 2-7's Asian Cafe!
We have refreshing drinks and sweets!
We also offer special discounts for couples!
It is really hot out today.
And we have less flyers than we thought we would need...
I will have to go copy some more.
Ah, it is so cold and good!
Mizu-chin, you really know what hits the spot!
He told me to tell you it must be hard handing out all those flyers, since it is so hot out.
What is up with that costume?
So that is what it is called on the menu.
Ah, um... it was really good.
A piece of banana, milk, ice, and syrup.
I am working the late shift today.
You also graduated from here, Ayaka-san?
Do not go putting strange things in her head
I will never trust you again
Be the way, do they still have that whole confession time during the closing festival?
I just cannot seem to relax in here.
Moto, make the drinks to go, would you?
I see... so they still have it.
There was this one time where I was confessed to and ran right into the relationship.
But we broke up right away.
I have some good memories because of it, though.
Do you have a new boyfriend yet?
I heard you broke up, so I thought there might be someone else you like.
Ah, no, that is not exactly it...
I have not really sorted out my feelings on the issue yet...
Do you know how to forget about an old love?
You should completely immerse yourself in it.
If that new love is true, then the old love will naturally become part of the past.
It is not that you can fall in love with someone new because you forgot the old...
It is because you fall in love with someone new that you are able to forget about the old.
Only love can heal a heart that was hurt by love.
Think about it and make your decision.
Whatever you do or do not do, you are the one who always makes the decision.
You are the one who always makes the decision...
Now, let us see how this all comes to rest.
Oh... we made enough to pay everyone...
I cannot believe it, but that ripoff menu produced results...
It is all thanks to Yano.
Are not we going to leave yet?
They said they are running late because of the traffic.
She is still alive within you.
Hey, is it really all right for you to go out with me?
I am famous for being the stupid girl.
Your reputation will take a hit.
People who call other people stupid are stupid.
So... you think you are stupid.
People are truly stupid when they cannot even realize their own stupidity.
So do not ever call yourself stupid.
People who call other people stupid are stupid!
The past holds as little reality as your dreams.
There is a ton of people here again this year!
Everyone, let them hear you shout!
Hey, you are going too fast!
Give some space to the people in front of you!
You are going to wear yourselves out!
Hey, if it all goes well, I will treat you to something.
You are going to confess, right?
He is been my best friend since elementary school.
He is more important to me than my family is.
So you will choose friendship over love?
I do not want to lose either.
I wonder if I am being selfish...
Which is why you would better treat me to something if I lose my best friend tonight.
This year really went by quickly...
Ah, come to think of it, Yano confessed to you on this day last year, did not he?
Now that I think about it, it did not even last a year.
Is it time to rotate yet?
My old friends from middle school.
They must have been bored tonight.
Something interesting's bound to happen this year...
Who will end up crying, and who will be left laughing?
If that new love is true...
Kono kokoro wo tamotsu you ni
Itsu no hi ni mo mitsuketeita
Kimi ga mitsumeru saki ni wa
Kono kokoro wo nadameru you ni
Boku ga motomeru saki ni wa
It continues to fall, refusing to let up,
almost as if it is sustaining my feelings.
I have always found your gentle back
on that day, but where do
and it seems like we will make it, but we do not.
The rain continues to fall softly.
It is as if it is meant to soothe my heart,
I am always looking at your
cute back, but these winding feelings
point me in the other direction.
at the end of my search?
and it seems like we will make it, but we do not.
and it seems like we will make it, but we do not.
I am glad you were my friend.
You better make sure you do not forget those words.
Yano's headed your way right now.
If my intuition's correct, Takeuchi-kun's coming, too.
I am still undecided about my feelings...
